backend/main.mo: Implements a simple rate‑limit system storing last action timestamps per device and enforcing a 3‑minute cooldown.
feature_evidence.json: Contains a feature evidence report describing an update to load the first Visual Trust image from an external URL.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Lists summaries of all frontend files, describing their roles in routing, sections, components, styling, and configuration.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind base styles and OKLCH color variables for both light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry file that sets metadata, loads Google Fonts, and mounts the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with routes for home, privacy, and terms pages wrapped in a shared layout.
frontend/src/components/common/ImageWith: Reusable image component that shows a gradient placeholder on load or error while preserving layout.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer with company info, links, and a rate‑limited WhatsApp button using backend validation.
frontend/src/components/layout/Navbar.ts: Sticky navbar supporting smooth section scrolling, responsive mobile sheet menu, and brand navigation.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Layout wrapper that displays the navbar, routed page content, and footer.
frontend/src/components/sections/AboutSe: About section describing MagadhPrime’s production quality and natural processing approach.
frontend/src/components/sections/Benefit: Benefits section showing four feature cards highlighting product quality and health advantages.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Hero section with background imagery and a WhatsApp order button that checks rate limits before opening the link.
frontend/src/components/sections/Support: Support form with validation, rate‑limit checking, and Google Forms submission logic.
frontend/src/components/sections/VisualT: Displays a grid of production‑related images, using local or external asset URLs.
frontend/src/components/sections/WhatsAp: CTA section offering a WhatsApp order button with rate‑limit enforcement and error handling.
frontend/src/config/marketing.ts: Centralized marketing config including WhatsApp link generation, email, social links, address, and Google Forms IDs.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, login, logout, and stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/usePageMeta.ts: Hook that updates document title and meta description on mount or when inputs change.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup with custom color variables, theme layers, dark mode overrides, and utility classes.
frontend/src/lib/assetUrl.ts: Builds normalized asset URLs using Vite's BASE_URL, plus a helper for generated assets.
frontend/src/lib/deviceId.ts: Creates and stores a persistent per-device UUID in localStorage for identification.
frontend/src/lib/googleFormsSubmit.ts: Submits contact data to Google Forms using configured field mappings with no‑cors fetch.
frontend/src/lib/rateLimit.ts: Checks frontend rate limits via backend actor using a device‑scoped action identifier.
frontend/src/lib/scrollToSection.ts: Smoothly scrolls to a DOM section by ID with a fixed header offset.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider and mounts App.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the homepage sections and applies metadata plus hash‑based smooth scrolling.
frontend/src/pages/PrivacyPolicyPage.tsx: Displays the full Privacy Policy with headings, structured text, and page metadata.
frontend/src/pages/TermsOfUsePage.tsx: Displays the Terms of Use content with structured sections and page metadata.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling typography, container queries, animations, and theme extensions.
project_state.json: JSON project state describing requirements, architecture notes, known issues, and existing features.
